response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. My offer to you is $12,000, aiming to ensure both a fair deal and a reasonable profit for me. This opportunity won't last, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
